TopicTitle: new update mun locked in 1 position?

Articles.Content:
hi

I just tried to use the mun to sling me off into orbit around the sun, and it seems like the mun is not moving across the sky above KSC.

Its orbital time is the same as kerbin's rotation.

What the hell is going on?
How is a screenshot going to prove that something is NOT moving?

How is a screenshot going to prove that something is NOT moving?

Multiple screenshots, then: demonstrate current time (you can hit the MET text on the indicator now to show global game time) and Mun's position, fast-forward in 1-hour increments, and continue to demonstrate the Mun's position as unchanging in them.
^This. Multiple screenshots will have to be provided in order to show how the mun is not moving.

Unless you hyperedited the Mun into an altitude of ~2868.75km above Kerbin, then you've seriously broken the game.

That, or you just missed the Mun.
